body.p:
provides an add-on mechanism that can automatically discover and install frameworks and plugins from a remote location.
Frameworks that you install through the add-ons system are read-only.

section.title: Installing Add-ons
section.p:
To install a new add-on, follow these steps:
go to Help Install new add-ons...
in the opened dialog, fill-in the Show add-ons from with the update site that hosts add-ons. The add-ons list contains the name, status, update version, version, and the type of the add-on (either framework, or plugin). A short description of each add-on is presented under the add-ons list. To see all the add-ons from the remote update site, disable Show only compatible add-ons and Show only the latest version of the add-ons. Incompatible add-ons are shown only to acknowledge their presence on the remote update site. You cannot install an incompatible add-on.
by default, only the latest versions of the add-ons that are compatible with the current version of are displayed
choose the add-ons you want to install, press the Next button, then follow the on-screen instructions.Accepting the add-on's license agreement is a mandatory step in the installation processAll add-ons are installed in the preferences directory of , under the extensions directory.

section.title: Managing installed add-ons
section.p:
To manage the installed add-ons, follow these steps:
go to Help Manage add-ons...
the opened dialog presents a list with the available updates (compatible with the current version of ) and with the already installed updates. Under the updates list, presents a short description of each update.
check an add-on, then press Update to update it (or Uninstall to remove it). If there is available a newer version of the add-on, will download the package and install it. Follow the on-screen instructions to complete the installation processAccepting the add-on's license agreement is a mandatory step in the installation process

section.title: Checking for add-on updates
section.p: To check if there are available updates for the installed add-ons, go to Help Check for add-ons updates... . This action displays only updates compatible with the current version.

body.p: To watch a video demonstration about the add-ons support in , go to http://www.oxygenxml.com/demo/AddonsSupport.html.
